title: Frica de un atac al Rusiei pe flancul estic al NATO: O superputere, gata să stea în calea lui Putin, plan dezvăluit
description: Frica de un atac al Rusiei pe flancul estic al NATO rămâne la cote ridicate, indiferent dacă negocierile de pace din Ucraina se finalizează sau nu. Însă în spatele ușilor închise, o superputere este gata să stea în calea lui Vladimir Putin, dacă va duce invazia spre Vest. Germania a elaborat un plan prin care companii din domeniul Apărării de aici să sprijine logistic alte state NATO, în cazul unui atac al Moscovei asupra regiunii estice a alianței.
title_translated: The fear of an attack by Russia on the eastern flank of NATO: a superpower, ready to stand in the way of Putin, plan revealed
description_translated: The fear of an attack by Russia on NATO's eastern flank remains at high levels, whether or not peace negotiations are completed. But behind the closed doors, a superpower is ready to stand in the path of Vladimir Putin, if he will bring the invasion to the west. Germany has developed a plan whereby companies in the field of defense here logistically support other NATO states, in the event of an attack on Moscow on the Eastern Alliance region.

title: De ce s-au anulat alegerile. Explicațiile lui Băsescu: "În acvariul politicii românești evoluează mulți ticăloși. Măcar cei mai mari trebuie eliminați prin vot"
description: Traian Băsescu a atacat extrem de dur, miercuri seară, 23 aprilie, modul în care guvernul Ciolacu a organizat alegerile din 2024. Sub titlul "Să nu le dăm toată puterea prin votul nostru!", într-o postare critică făcută pe pagina personală de Facebook, Băsescu susține că scrutinele au fost făcute "strict în funcție de interesele PSD şi PNL". Mesajul face parte din seria de dezvăluiri promise de fostul președinte.
title_translated: Why the elections were canceled. Basescu's explanations: "In the aquarium of Romanian politics, many bastards evolve. At least the biggest must be eliminated by vote"
description_translated: Traian Basescu attacked extremely harsh, Wednesday, April 23, the way in which the Ciolacu government organized the elections of 2024. Under the title "Let us not give them all through our vote!", In a critical post made on the personal Facebook page, Basescu argues that the scrutins were made "strictly according to the PSD". The message is part of the series of disclosures promised by the former president.

title: Bursă. Pe 25 iunie, Hidroelectrica va distribui dividende de peste 4 mld. lei către acţionari: randament de peste 7%. La bugetul de stat merg 3,2 mld. lei, iar către Pilonul 2 de pensii private aproximativ 400 mil. lei

title: Bursă. Creşterea cantităţii de energie transportată şi tarifele mai mari majorează profitul Transelectrica la 158 mil. lei în T1/2025. Veniturile de 1,4 mld. lei. Acţiunile cresc
description: Creşterea cantităţilor de energie transportată cu 2,6% şi tarifele reglementate mai mari cu până la 20% au adus o creştere substanţială a profitului net al operatorului de transport Transelectrica (TEL) în primul trimestru.
title_translated: Scholarship. The increase in the amount of energy transported and the higher rates increase the transelectrica profit to 158 million lei in T1/2025. Revenues of 1.4 billion lei. The actions grow
description_translated: The increase of the amounts of energy transported by 2.6% and the regulated rates higher by up to 20% have brought a substantial increase in the net profit of the Transelectrica (Tel) transport operator.

title: Românii din Libia sunt sfătuiți să părăsească imediat această țară. Alertă de călătorie emisă de Ministerul de Externe
description: Ministerul Afacerilor Externe (MAE) reamintește cetățenilor români aflați în Libia că, în contextul situației de securitate din țară, este în vigoare o alertă de călătorie de nivel maxim - „Părăsiţi imediat ţara!”.

title: Gaza: Peste 30 de persoane, copii și aparținători, transferați în România

title: Facturi mai mici la curent pentru românii de la bloc: panourile solare, tot mai aproape

title: Fotbalul brazilian în criză: Șeful federației demis pentru fals în acte

title: Franța se teme de un „scenariu românesc” la prezidențialele din 2027

Îngrijorările se referă la o „infiltrare” rusească în „cercurile politice franceze” și de manipularea a informațiilor pe rețelele sociale potrivit Mediapart.fr.
title_translated: France is afraid of a "Romanian scenario" at the presidentials of 2027
description_translated: French secret services are afraid that foreign interference could distort the presidential elections that will take place in France in 2027. Concerns refer to a Russian "infiltration" in the "French political circles" and to manipulate information on social networks according to Mediapart.FR.

title: Ce concluzie a tras un român după 15 ani în Africa de Sud: „România e sigură”
description: Viața în Africa de Sud poate părea fascinantă privită din avion sau din resorturile luxoase ale orașelor mari, însă realitatea de zi cu zi a locuitorilor – mai ales a străinilor – e marcată de riscuri, adaptare și un grad înalt de vigilență.
title_translated: What conclusion a Romanian drew after 15 years in South Africa: "Romania is safe"
description_translated: Life in South Africa may seem fascinating from the plane or the luxurious resorts of large cities, but the daily reality of the inhabitants - especially of foreigners - is marked by risks, adaptation and a high degree of vigilance.

title: De ce nu-l extrădează autoritățile române pe adolescentul acuzat de terorism în SUA, unde ar risca închisoarea pe viață
description: Un adolescent român de 17 ani, acuzat în SUA de terorism și crearea de pornografie infantilă, rămâne în țară după ce Curtea de Apel București a decis să refuze cererea de extrădarea venită de la Washington. Magistrații români vor să-l trimită într-un centru de detenție pentru minori, în timp ce în SUA riscă închisoarea pe viață.
title_translated: Why does the Romanian authorities not extradite the adolescent accused of terrorism in the USA, where he would risk life imprisonment
description_translated: A 17 -year -old Romanian teenager, accused of terrorism and the creation of child pornography, remains in the country after the Bucharest Court of Appeal decided to refuse the extradition from Washington. Romanian magistrates want to send it to a minor detention center, while in the US they risk life imprisonment.

title: „România a evitat un glonț, dar Occidentul este încă în pericol”. Ce rămâne de făcut

Cei doi analizează ce a provocat ascensiunea extremei drepte și cum poate liberalismul să recupereze încrederea oamenilor obișnuiți.
title_translated: "Romania avoided a bullet, but the West is still in danger." What remains to be done
description_translated: Former prime minister, head of the Diplomacy in Bucharest and director of the Foreign Intelligence Service Mihai Răzvan Ungureanu, along with Dan Perry, the first correspondent of Associated Press in post-communist Romania, signs an opinion article in Newsweek in which I point out that the elections in our country mark a new turning point in Democracy. The two analyze what caused the ascension of the extreme right and how the liberalism can recover the confidence of ordinary people.

El adaugă că aceasta este prima țară pe care ar vrea să o viziteze în calitate de președinte, „pentru că e simbolic”.

title: Impostoarea care a păcălit o întreagă insulă. Schema de îmbogățire cu care a vrut să convingă 1.000 de scoțieni să se mute în Australia
description: Annie Gordon Baillie și-a câștigat existența păcălind proprietarii de magazine din Marea Britanie în Epoca Victoriană, având peste 40 de identități false. În 1884, însă, a încercat să dea marea lovitură: prefăcându-se că este o romancieră aristocrată, ea a încercat să se îmbogățească punând la cale o schemă prin care cel puțin 1.000 de locuitori ai unei insule scoțiene urmau să se mute într-o mlaștină din Australia, profitând de un conflict violent între fermierii locali și marii proprietari de terenuri, potrivit BBC.
title_translated: The impostor who tricked an entire island. The enrichment scheme with which he wanted to convince 1,000 Scots to move to Australia
description_translated: Annie Gordon Baillie has earned her existence by deceiving the owners of stores in the UK in the Victorian era, with over 40 false identities. In 1884, however, he tried to give the big blow: pretending to be an aristocratic novelist, she tried to enrich herself by setting up a scheme by which at least 1,000 inhabitants of a Scottish island were to move to a marsh from Australia, taking advantage of a violent conflict between the local farmers.

description: Dacă azi ar fi alegeri în Ungaria, partidul lui Viktor Orban ar pierde cu o diferență de 7 procente în fața partidului Tisza. Avansul Tisza este constant de mai multe luni, iar săptămâna trecută, liderul acestuia, Peter Magyar a făcut o vizită la Oradea într-un mod inedit. El a mers pe jos din Budapesta, timp de 11 zile. Reacțiile au fost la fel ca preferințele politice: polarizate.
title_translated: UDMR does not want to be the opposition of V. Orbán
description_translated: If today there were elections in Hungary, Viktor Orban's party would lose a 7 percent difference in front of the Tisza party. The advance of Tisza has been constantly for several months, and last week, his leader, Peter Magyar paid a visit to Oradea in a unique way. He walked from Budapest for 11 days. The reactions were the same as the political preferences: polarized.

title: Băuturile energizante, asociate cu dezvoltarea leucemiei. Legătura dintre taurină și creșterea celulelor canceroase
description: Taurina, un aminoacid prezent în mod natural în organism și adesea adăugat în băuturile energizante, ar putea stimula dezvoltarea anumitor tipuri de cancer, inclusiv leucemia, potrivit unui nou studiu realizat de cercetători de la University of Rochester. Experimentele de laborator arată că această substanță poate accelera multiplicarea celulelor canceroase, în special în măduva osoasă, informează Science Alert.
title_translated: Energizing drinks, associated with the development of leukemia. The bond between taurine and growth of cancer cells
description_translated: Taurine, an amino acid naturally present in the body and often added in energizing drinks, could stimulate the development of certain types of cancer, including leukemia, according to a new study by researchers at the University of Rochester. Laboratory experiments show that this substance can accelerate the multiplication of cancer cells, especially in the bone marrow, informs science alert.

title: Nicușor Dan devine oficial președintele României. Ceremonia de învestire are loc de la ora 12:00 la Palatul Parlamentului
description: Luni, 26 mai, începând cu ora 12:00, are loc ceremonia oficială de învestire a lui Nicușor Dan în funcția de președinte al României. Evenimentul se desfășoară în plenul reunit al Parlamentului, după validarea mandatului său de către Curtea Constituțională, joi.
title_translated: Nicușor Dan officially becomes the President of Romania. The investment ceremony takes place at 12:00 at the Parliament Palace
description_translated: On Monday, May 26, starting at 12:00, the official investment ceremony of Nicușor Dan takes place as president of Romania. The event takes place in the plenary of the Parliament, after the validation of its mandate by the Constitutional Court on Thursday.

title: Greu cu PSD, dar mai greu singuri. Ce vor liberalii să obțină din negocierile pentru viitorul guvern
description: Deși de ani de zile auzim cum PNL nu mai poate trăi alături de PSD, că se scufundă, iată că nici guvernarea fără colegii social-democrați nu îi încântă pe liberali. Motivul principal este ponderea mare în Parlament a partidelor catalogate ca fiind extremiste și teama ca un guvern minoritar să nu fie constant sancționat sau chiar dat jos mai rapid decât și-ar dori. Semnalul „cu PSD la guvernare” vine, în primul rând, de la Ilie Bolojan, care se întoarce de la Cotroceni direct în fruntea partidului și pe care, cel mai probabil, îl vom vedea la Palatul Victoria cât de curând.
title_translated: Hard with PSD, but harder alone. What do liberals want to get from negotiations for future government
description_translated: Although for years we have heard how PNL can no longer live with the PSD, that it sank, here the government without the social-democratic colleagues do not delight the Liberals. The main reason is the high share in Parliament of the parties listed as extremist and fear that a minority government should not be constantly sanctioned or even lower than they would like. The signal "with PSD in government" comes, first of all, from Ilie Bolojan, who returns from Cotroceni directly to the party and which, most likely, we will see at the Victoria Palace as soon.

description: La nici doi ani de la retragere, Eden Hazard, acum în vârstă de 34 de ani, a șocat cu apariția recentă la un meci caritabil organizat în Anglia. Greoi, cu kilograme în plus față de perioada în activitate, belgianul considerat nu demult cel mai bun jucător din Premier League este de nerecunoscut.În 2019, Eden Hazard făcea trecerea de la Chelsea la Real Madrid având statutul de unul dintre cei mai buni fotbaliști ai lumii. ...
title_translated: Do you recognize him? Withdrawn for two years, the 120 million euro player has extra pounds and is barely moving: "I am a hedonist. Grace, red wine, all"
description_translated: Not two years after withdrawal, Eden Hazard, now 34 years old, shocked with recent appearance at a charity match organized in England. Heavy, with kilograms in addition to the period in the activity, the Belgian considered not long ago the best player in the Premier League is unrecognizable. In 2019, Eden Hazard was passing from Chelsea to Real Madrid having one of the best footballers in the world. ... ...

title: Războiul de zi cu zi al parcărilor din Capitală. Ce amendă riscă cei care rezervă ilegal locurile de pe domeniul public
description: Un război tăcut, dar acut, se duce în fiecare zi pe străzile orașelor din Capitală. Nu cu arme, ci cu lădițe, scaune, tomberoane sau bidoane de plastic. Sunt uneltele celor care își rezervă ilegal locuri de parcare pe domeniul public, ca și cum ar fi proprietatea lor. Noi am vrut să vedem ce se întâmplă dacă încerci să „cucerești” unul dintre aceste teritorii. Am mutat obstacolele și am parcat. Iată reacțiile:
title_translated: The daily war of parking lots in the Capital. What fine do those who illegally reserve the places in the public domain
description_translated: A silent, but acute war, goes every day on the streets of the Capital cities. Not with weapons, but with crates, chairs, dumps or plastic cans. They are the tools of those who illegally reserve parking spaces in the public domain, as if their property. We wanted to see what happens if you try to "conquer" one of these territories. I moved obstacles and parked. Here are the reactions:

title: Armata britanică va trimite hackerii pe urma lui Putin. „Tastatura a devenit o armă de război”

John Healey a promis să acorde forțelor armate mai multe puteri online pentru a viza statele ostile, precum Rusia lui Vladimir Putin, avertizând că „tastatura a devenit o armă de război”, scrie The Telegraph.
title_translated: The British army will send hackers after Putin. "The keyboard has become a war weapon"
description_translated: The British army will spend over a billion pounds for artificial intelligence and a cyber attack, the Minister of Defense announced. John Healey has promised to give the armed forces more online powers to target hostile states, such as Vladimir Putin's Russia, warning that "the keyboard has become a war weapon," writes The Telegraph.

title: Cine este noul lider militar al Hamas, care stă în calea unui armistițiu în Fâșia Gaza. Israelul a încercat să-l asasineze de șase ori
description: Printre toți militanții mascați care urmăreau eliberarea din Gaza a trei ostatici israelieni, se afla un bărbat care avea un interes personal ca transferul să se desfășoare fără probleme. Până la eliberarea ostaticilor în ianuarie, Izz al-Din al-Haddad deja avansase în rândurile Hamas după ce supraviețuise în urma a șase tentative de asasinat și se spune că fusese însărcinat cu reconstrucția infrastructurii civile și militare în timpul unei scurte perioade de acalmie în războiul cu Israelul. Izz al-Din al-Haddad, un comandant veteran și cel mai căutat agent Hamas de către Israel, este acum responsabil de aripa militară a grupării din Gaza.
title_translated: Who is the new military leader of Hamas, who is in the way of an armistice in the Gaza strip. Israel tried to assassinate him six times
description_translated: Among all the masked militants who were pursuing the release of three Israeli hostages, there was a man who had a personal interest for the transfer to take place without problems. Until the hostages were released in January, Izz Al-Din Al-Haddad had already advanced in the Hamas ranks after surviving six assassination attempts and was said to have been in charge of reconstructing civil and military infrastructure during a short period of calm in the war with Israel. Izz Al-Din Al-Haddad, a veteran commander and the most sought after agent by Israel, is now responsible for the military wing of the Gaza group.

title: Adenom de prostată gigant, operat prin procedură minim invazivă
description: Petre, de 71 de ani, se confrunta de mult timp cu unele dificultăți la urinare, însă nu a dat prea multă importantă crezând că nu e ceva grav. În plus, a pus totul pe seama vârstei. Bărbatul a suportat această situație care implica urinare frecventă și dificilă mai ales noaptea, până în momentul în care nu a mai putut urina deloc. Abia atunci a realizat că trebuie să meargă de urgență la spital. Vezica urinară era în tensiune, plină cu urină care nu mai putea fi evacuată din cauza blocajului produs la nivelul uretrei de un adenom de prostată gigant. Soluția de moment a fost montarea unei sonde urinare.
title_translated: Giant prostate adenoma, operated by minimally invasive procedure
description_translated: Petre, 71 years old, has long been facing some difficulties in urination, but has not given too much important to believe that it was not serious. In addition, he put everything on account of his age. The man endured this situation that involves frequent and difficult urination especially at night, until he could not urinate at all. Only then did he realize that he had to go to the hospital urgently. The bladder was in tension, full of urine that could no longer be evacuated due to the blockage produced in the urethra by a giant prostate adenoma. The moment solution was to install a urinary probe.

description_translated: The average price required for a three -room old apartment, built between 1978 and 1990, climbed in May 2025 to 123,077 euros, according to the ZF real estate index together with SVN Romania. Compared to April, the advance is 1.5%, the equivalent of almost 2,000 euros, and compared to May 2024, the increase is 14.6%and 15,769 euros.

description_translated: In a video recording, he quoted the recent Colorado attack on a demonstration in support of Israeli hostages to explain their decision. He also invoked the reason for the "protection" of the country of "foreign terrorists".

description: Automobile Dacia SA lansează în această lună o nouă campanie de plecări voluntare pentru angajații din diferite sectoare de activitate. Compania motivează acțiunea prin „nevoia de reorganizare în coerență cu noile proiecte și provocări”, conform...
title_translated: The last hour Dacia triggers voluntary dismissals, with bonuses that reach tens of thousands of euros
description_translated: Automobile Dacia SA launches a new voluntary departure campaign this month for employees from different sectors of activity. The company motivates the action by "the need for reorganization in coherence with the new projects and challenges", according to ...

title: Critici dure după ce SUA au blocat rezoluția ONU pentru pace în Gaza: O "pată morală pe conștiința" Consiliului
description: SUA au stârnit miercuri mânia celorlalţi membri ai Consiliului de Securitate după ce noul lor veto a blocat un apel la încetarea imediată a focului între Israel și Hamas şi accesul umanitar în Gaza, informează AFP.
title_translated: Harsh critics after the US have blocked the UN Peace Resolution in Gaza: a "moral stain on the council
description_translated: The US sparked the wrath of the other members of the Security Council on Wednesday after their new Veto blocked an immediate cessation of fire between Israel and Hamas and humanitarian access to Gaza, AFP reports.

title: UE a cerut statelor membre să diminueze rapid utilizarea resurselor de apă. Țările care se confruntă cu probleme
description: Comisia Europeană a cerut miercuri statelor europene să diminueze utilizarea resurselor de apă până în 2030 din cauza stresului hidric cauzat de încălzirea globală, relatează AFP.
title_translated: The EU has asked the Member States to quickly reduce the use of water resources. Countries that face problems
description_translated: The European Commission asked European states on Wednesday to reduce the use of water resources by 2030 due to water stress caused by global warming, AFP reports.

title: Jocurile Asiatice din Japonia 2026: Un „sat plutitor” pe vas de croazieră va găzdui sportivii participanți la eveniment
description: MediafaxOrganizatorii Jocurilor Asiatice care se vor desfășura în 2026 în Japonia au găsit o soluție neobișnuită pentru cazarea participanților: un „sat plutitor" pe un vas de croazieră și adăposturi din containere maritime.Articolul Jocurile Asiatice din Japonia 2026: Un „sat plutitor” pe vas de croazieră va găzdui sportivii participanți la eveniment apare prima dată în Mediafax.
title_translated: Asian games in Japan 2026: A "floating village" on the cruise ship will host the athletes participating in the event
description_translated: Mediafaxorganizators of Asian games that will take place in 2026 in Japan have found an unusual solution for the accommodation of participants: a "floating village" on a cruise ship and maritime containers.
